title: Sucked Off by a Sandwich
description:
Â This one's a journey. The boys riff on childhood dreams, how Vicki Vallencourt was the perfect woman for Michael, and which athletes have the craziest DMs. They also get into maintaining old friendships, how fuckin hard it is to talk to people since the pandemic, then get a surprise drop-in from Blau Sr., and hear a couple of WILD listener stories.

Get the full episode and instant access to the Patreon back catalog for $5/month at www.patreon.com/stiffsockspod
